Logging.File: The physical path to the Serilog log file goes here. Logging and Monitoring must have different paths.

Monitoring.File: The physical path to the Sentry log file goes here. Logging and Monitoring must have different paths.
Monitoring.Url: The fully qualified URL for the Sentry DSN goes here.

Connection.User: The user login name for the database connection string goes here.
Connection.Password: The password for the database connection string goes here.

Security.Secret: The encryption key for this version in this environment goes here.

Root.Name: Root
Root.Secret: The secret key assigned to Root sentinel goes here.

Test.Name: Test
Test.Secret: The secret key assigned to Test sentinel goes here.
